transcript.text: Bribery and corruption are a real threat to companies like ours who do business ethically. In this module, learn what you need to do to avoid these risks and comply with our policies and the law.

panelText.text: Our reputation depends on doing business honestly and fairly. Bribery and corruption are illegal, and there is no place for them at Johnson Controls.
We expect you to be able to recognize bribery and corrupt activities and avoid them – even if they would give Johnson Controls a business advantage.
Bribery and corruption aren’t always obvious, so it’s important to know what to look for.

instructionText.text: Click on Next (bottom right arrow) to continue.
